Title: Safe House
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Andy Gosche, Carly Hallam (executive story editor), Jessica Polonsky (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: After Seamus threatens Kevin, Holt devises an elaborate plan to hide him in a safe house, with Jake as his guard. Kevin is miserable as the 99 works overtime to find Seamus and take him down.
